svg.text: ┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ STATISTICAL POWER │ ├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤ │ │ │ Power = P(Reject H₀ | H₁ is true) │ │ = 1 - β │ │ = Probability of detecting a TRUE effect │ │ │ │ 80% Power means: │ │ If there really is an effect of the size you specified, │ │ you have an 80% chance of detecting it. │ │ │ │ 20% of the time (β), you'll miss it (Type II error) │ │ │ └─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
